level.text: 147.1 All entities filing one of the applications listed below must include withheir application a draft Order approving the application. This draft Order muste filed electronically in the format approved by the Commission. The followingpplications are subject to this requirement:
Applications to become a competitive local exchange carrier pursuant tohapter 25 of the Commission’s rules;
Applications to transfer or assign competitive local exchange carrierertifications pursuant to section 2512 of the Commission’s rules;
Applications for approval of a negotiated, mediated, or arbitratednterconnection agreement pursuant to Chapter 26 of the Commission’sules;
Applications for abandonment of service or certification pursuant to Chapter7 of the Commission’s rules;
Applications for electricity suppliers required by Order No. 11796; and
Applications for gas suppliers required by Order No. 12709.
